Package network.rmi.client

Class ClientNetworkRMI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • network.rmi.client.ClientNetworkRMI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, ClientInterface, ClientNetworkRMIInterface, ServerInterface
    public class ClientNetworkRMI
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ClientNetworkRMIInterface
    Contains all the method defined in ServerInterface and ClientInterface.

      • reconnect

        public Tuple3<java.lang.Boolean,​java.lang.Boolean,​Tuple<java.lang.String,​GameMode>> reconnect​(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String password)
                                                                                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                                                                                InvalidLoginException
        Description copied from interface: ClientInterface
        Method used to require a login procedure after a disconnection (the player must have a username and password)
        Specified by:
        reconnect in interface ClientInterface
        Parameters:
        username - the name requested
        password - the password used
        Returns:
        A triple containing: a boolean that indicates if the the login operation worked correctly, a boolean that indicates if the game is already started, and a tuple that contains the name and the mode of the game
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException - this exception contains all the information needed to identify the error
        java.rmi.RemoteException
